weapon_description: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.
weapon_skill_description: Increases Shield Strength by 40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.
